thread.title: UK consumer spending falls in April - Visa

title: UK consumer spending falls in April - Visa
text:
UK consumer spending falls in April - Visa Monday, May 14, 2018 - 01:45
New surveys from Britain's beleaguered retail sector show consumers tightened their belts further last month and store footfall in 'unprecedented' decline. As Kate King reports, a British Retail Consortium report last week suggested the sharpest drop in sales since its records began in 1995.
New surveys from Britain's beleaguered retail sector show consumers tightened their belts further last month and store footfall in 'unprecedented' decline.
